title: League client will not open.
body: After trying to open league, the logo just pops up and then disappears. Can someone help with this??

replies.body: Should be a simple permissions fix! Make sure that you've got League setup with admin access by following the steps in the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) if you're unsure of how to get that done!
Looking into my league files, there is no "lol.launcher" folder in RADS>Projects. I should need that, right?
